items.sentence: I stuck around for a while to see if anyone else would come.
I want to learn how to use my new digital camera right away.
I wish I could figure out how to delete my Facebook account.
I won this guitar in a poker game three weeks ago in Boston.
I wonder why so many people were in the park this afternoon.
Tom called to ask if there was anything he could do to help.
Tom can pick you up at the train station if you want him to.
Tom can speak French almost as well as he can speak English.
What are you doing here, Tom? Mary doesn\'t want to see you.
I can usually tell when someone is hiding something from me.
